summary:
Sonja Vrijyn -The Merciless- --CBBE Stand-alone--   
Adds an additional Companion to the realm of Skyrim. 
Future updates will include quests, story enhancement, player home and another companion!
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y485/Amorphis87/Sonja_Companion/CleanBanner_zpsaa41f399.jpg[/IMG]
[color=#CDBE70]-=-This mod uses the 2048x2048 CBBE // Navetsea Mesh & Textures -=-[/color]
[size=4]3 Hair Colours + 4 Eye Variants![/size] 

----Just an update. I am currently reworking Sonja\'s looks and quest so it\'ll be a while for another update.



[IMG]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y485/Amorphis87/SC%20-%20Sections/UpcomingFeatures_zps1228b092.jpg[/IMG]


[color=#32CD32] - Sonja companion implementation.
 - NMM All-In-One Installer.
 - General testing/awaiting feedback for improvements/fixes.
 -  Implementation of Bera (No Customization. Find him in the world and steal his journal. Or kill him. You decide).
 - Optional Hair colours [Black, Brown or Red].
 - Optional Eye colours [Brown, Light-Blue, Green or Light-Green]. [/color]
[color=#EEDC82] - Hair Variants
 - More Hair Colours
 - More Eye Colours
- Story Upgrades[/color]
 [color=#8B0000]  - More Warpaints
- More to be revealed later...[/color]

| [color=#32CD32]Implemented[/color]  |  [color=#EEDC82]Next Patch[/color]  |  [color=#8B0000]Future Plans[/color] |


[IMG]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y485/Amorphis87/SC%20-%20Sections/Introduction_zps7fa1353b.jpg[/IMG]


[size=3]This mod will add a new companion, Sonja Vrujyin, to the realm of Skyrim! 
This is stand-alone companion Mod. No files are necessary, but I recommend a few mods (in the Recommended section below) that can benefit this companion a lot.

For enquiries (about armors, animations etc) in screenshots, see the Recommended & Credits sections!

[color=#CD3278]MAKE SURE YOU CHECK THE VERSION, INSTALLATION, AND FAQ SECTIONS FOR IMPORTANT INFORMATION![/color]

 -=- If you like the mod =-=

 - Please Endorse it. The more endorsements, the more I get motivated to expand the mod.
 - If you like the Meshes and textures used, follow the links under the \'Credits and Thanks\' section below.
 - Check back for updates and added features!
 - I am not the best at posing and screenshots, so send some in for me!


[IMG]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y485/Amorphis87/SC%20-%20Sections/SonjasHistory_zps9a640616.jpg[/IMG]
[Color=#EEDC82][Under Development][/color]


Sonja claims to be an adventure from Hammerfell. But she won’t digress where. Her family were killed several years ago, and the murderer behind their deaths remains a mystery. The surviving members of the Vrijyn family consist of Yana, Bera and Sonja herself. Sonja’s nord half-siblings never accepted her as their true sister and despised her from the very moment of her birth. Rumor has it that Bera and Yana has returned to their homeland of Skyrim to find solace with their elder siblings. 

Sonja sold the farm that she inherited from her mother and bought a passage to Skyrim in search of her half-siblings. Why Bera and Yana fled after the massacre of five of their kin is unknown. Will you accept her as your partner and unravel the mysteries surrounding her past? Or will you encounter her siblings and search for the answers yourself?
The choice will be yours.


[IMG]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y485/Amorphis87/SC%20-%20Sections/CombatStats_zps1d72812d.jpg[/IMG]


 - +20% Attack with Two-Handed Greatswords.
 - +20% To block.
 - Sneak perks such as: Silence & Lightfoot.
 - +40% sneak; for those who want a cautious follower!
 - Level up to 100.
 - Light Armor is a bonus! Equip her with some for a better Barbarian Class!
 - Efficient (yet balanced) archer for those nasty dragon fights, but don\'t expect her to take down legions of dragons in a single fight with a bow.
 - She can die! Be sure to help her out! (or you can let her die and [~] resurrect).


General Information:
---------------------------

 - [ ] Essential?
 - [x] Protected? -[She will die if you attack her while she is in her defeated pose].
 - [x] Marriable?
 - [ ] Companion Sidequests? -[A full story with a quest line will be in future patches. Expect her brother to show up also!]
 - [x] Configurable in UFO? 


[IMG]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y485/Amorphis87/SC%20-%20Sections/SonjasLocation_zpsf28049f5.jpg[/IMG]


You can find Sonja in The Whiterun Markets!


[IMG]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y485/Amorphis87/Banner3_zps81eab7ee.jpg[/IMG]


[IMG]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y485/Amorphis87/SC%20-%20Sections/Installation_zpsaaa1c18f.jpg[/IMG]
[Always check the Current Version (highlighted in blue up the top section) before re-downloading/downloading]                                                                                                            

                                                            
[IMG]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y485/Amorphis87/Sonja_Companion/DownloadwithNexusModManager_zps63e1f49e.jpg[/IMG]
  
OR

For Manual Installation,
- Download file & extract files from 00 Required Files to Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data. 
- Choose the Warpaint or Clean Edition from respective folders and override.
- Choose Hair Texture
- Choose Eye textures.

[IMG]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y485/Amorphis87/SC%20-%20Sections/KnownIssues_zps4572082d.jpg[/IMG]

- The Four Seasons Inn Mod will trap Sonja within. 


[IMG]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y485/Amorphis87/SC%20-%20Sections/FAQ_zps41e39b8a.jpg[/IMG]


[color=#61B329]Q: What Body is this for?[/color]
[color=#CDBE70]A: This is a stand-alone mod. Sonja will use Custom CBBE meshes and textures.[/color]

[color=#61B329]Q: Do I require anything to use this?[/color]
[color=#CDBE70]A: No, you don\'t. I have included a Barkeeper and a Scale Armor mesh for her body type. If you give her armor/clothing that has been changed to fit a body other than CBBE, you may get clipping.[/color]

[color=#61B329]Q: Will you upload [Insert other body mod here] version?[/color]
[color=#CDBE70]A: Probably not, since she uses a stand-alone mesh.[/color]

[color=#61B329]Q: Do you have any other companion mods?[/color]
[color=#CDBE70]A: No. This is my first mod, ever. I will be adding another companion at a later date.[/color]

[color=#61B329]Q: What ENB/Lighting Mods do you use?[/color]
[color=#CDBE70]A: I only use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043]Enhanced Lights and FX [/url] by anamorfus, not ENB. My settings are on max with texture packs.[/color]

[color=#61B329]Q: Why doesn\'t she have the Redguard skin-colour?[/color]
[color=#CDBE70]A: See Sonja\'s history. LOREWISE, she is Half-Redguard, Half-Nord. I figured a mixure would be perfect (And it suited the red-hair, too).[/color]

[color=#61B329]Q: What hair does she use?[/color]
[color=#CDBE70]A: Apachii has kindly granted me the use of her ApachiiSkyHairFemale v1.3 Hairs. I used one of those for Sonja\'s hair and customised the texture location so it wouldn\'t interfere or override the ApachiiHair.esm/ApachiiHairFemale.esm files. [/color]

[color=#61B329]Q: Will you add more variety of hair and colours?[/color]
[color=#CDBE70]A: I may add a brunette or possibly a blonde version in the future, depending on what will suit her visually & lore-wise.[/color]

[color=#61B329]Q: Can you make her Essential?[/color]
[color=#CDBE70]A: I might depending on the quests that will be implemented in the future.[/color]

[color=#61B329]Q: Sonja\'s armor and clothing look different on mine, why?[/color]
[color=#CDBE70]A: Sonja\'s gear only uses custom-made meshes, not the textures. If you want the same texture as mine, check out the \'Recommended Mods\' section.[/color]

[color=#61B329]Q: Why can\'t I strip her naked?[/color]
[color=#CDBE70]A: It is a mechanic in the Creation Kit. You can use UFO and tell them to \'dress better\', which will allow you to trade the items she carries - stripping her naked in the process.[/color]

[color=#61B329]Q: How can I go straight to the Bannered Mare in Whiterun to check her out at the beginning of the game?[/color]
[color=#CDBE70]A: Open the Console [~] and type: coc whiterunbanneredmare, she wonders around near the entrance.[/color]
